sys_variable_value.value: Your order is ready to ship

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear 6➛...➛First name,

Your order for 6 - Update Record➛...➛Item Name is ready to ship to your 6 - Update Record➛...➛Ship to Location and will arrive in 3-5 days.

 

Good luck out there.

Respectfully,

M

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear 6➛...➛First name,

Your order for 6 - Update Record➛...➛Item Name is ready to ship to your 6 - Update Record➛...➛Ship to Location and will arrive in 3-5 days.

 

Good luck out there.

Respectfully,

M
